comment: This college needs more professors like Professor Hennessy. He is just amazing! He really cares about his students. He uses real world examples and his own industry experience to convey the material in an easy to understand way. Just show up, do the work, and you will get a good grade. I would highly recommend taking his course.
Very Straight forward, go to class and do the work you will get an A. Dan uses practical real world examples to make the course materials very easy to understand.

Professor Hennessy is a great professor. He really cares about his students and is very knowledgable about marketing. Show up to class, participate and you will do great. Weekly quizzes/homework, a group project, and then mid term and final.

Professor Hennessy was an amazing teacher! I was not that excited to take a Saturday class, but it was honestly worth it! He is so nice and a fair grader. All of his exams and assignments are super easy, and he makes it to where you want to learn the material. Trust me and take his class you won't regret it.

Hennessy is such a great professor. If you are on the fences, DO IT!! He is so knowledgeable and has real world experience in marketing. He makes class engaging and lectures are entertaining. I was nervous taking a Saturday class but I'm glad I did. You have one big group project, small hw assignments, quizzes, and exams. Attendance is a grade.
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: The things you learn in this class will be very practical (not as theoretical). He often cites current events while teaching new concepts. Also, he's had a very successful career and draws upon knowledge gained through it. Would recommend.
